metadata.description:
Curious about the Atomeka imprint at Titan Comics?

Wondering how Editor Dave Elliot has gathered so many astounding, creator-owned stories together in one place?

Here's your chance to sample pages, pin-ups and whole stories from 'A1 Annual' Vol. 1, 'Monster Massacre' Vol. 1 and Vol. 2, 'The Weirding Willows', 'Odyssey' and 'Carpe DIEm' - all available to purchase now on comiXology!

Over 100 pages of content! 

Try Atomeka for FREE today!
metadata.name: A1
